name: Capitol AI
long_description:
Capitol is an infinitely smart AI research assistant with access to your important documents, enabling you to create high-quality content instantly. You can generate informed articles, white papers, marketing content, and tweet storms. Capitol has a D2C product, and a B2B product offering for companies that want to embed real-time content creation and editing into their applications. 

Politico has exclusively partnered with Capitol to power all Politico Pro users with AI content creation for policy and regulatory analysis. 

In the future, all publishers of content and data will have an AI research layer. Capitol will be the category-defining product to unlock this transformation.
one_liner: Infinitely smart research assistant that generates content from data
